channel.title: AI on Vin Patel
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Vin Patel

item.title: HumanMark
item.description: The only AI detector that runs 100% on your infrastructure. Detect AI-generated text, images, audio & video—offline, self-hosted, zero external API calls.

item.title: The Great Inversion: Why Human Content Will Become the Scarcest Resource in an AI World
item.description: AI now writes 46% of all code. Over 50% of new web content is machine-generated. We’re not heading toward an AI future—we’re already living in one. Here’s why I believe human authenticity is about to become the scarcest, most valuable resource on the planet.

item.title: The AI Creative Revolution: Image & Video Generators Have Crossed the Threshold
item.description: Image generators have crossed from ‘impressive party trick’ to ‘production-ready tool’ in under 3 years. Video generators are 18 months behind on that same curve. Here’s what that means for your business.
